text: Tumhare liye un do giroohon mein ek nishan e ibrat tha, jo (badr mein) ek dusre se nabard aazma (encountered) huey, ek giroh Allah ki raah mein ladd raha tha aur dusra giroh kafir tha, dekhne waley ba-chashm e sar dekh rahey thay ke kafir giroh momin giroh se do chandh (twice the number) hai magar (nateeje ne saabit kardiya ke) Allah apni fatah o nusrat se jisko chahta hai madad deta hai. Deedha e beena(eyes to see) rakhne walon ke liye ismein bada sabaq posheeda hai
